scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix client && npm test --prefix server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix client && npm run lint:fix --prefix server
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix client && npm run format --prefix server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix client && npm run type-check --prefix server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
